Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40500 - Authentication failed.</li> <li>40520 -Error while retrieving the translations.</li> </ul> <p>To use this subflow, the corresponding RWS TMS Connection & Credential alias must be configured. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/SDL_Translation_Management_System_Spoke">Learn <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>This Subflow will get the translated Content (XLIFF1.2) from RWS.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>LFTASK Number</strong> - Associated Localization Task number. </li> <li> <strong>Project Info</strong> - It is an object contains a project_id. </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <li> <strong>Translated XLIFF 1.2</strong> - Translated XLIFF file content (version 1.2) received from RWS. </li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40500 - Authentication failed.</li> <li>40520 -Error while retrieving the translations.</li> </ul> <p>To use this subflow, the corresponding RWS TMS Connection & Credential alias must be configured. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/SDL_Translation_Management_System_Spoke">Learn
